answers.answer: It took me like a week and it was very painful :/ I had to go bad but couldn't and I literally gagged from not being able to go :/ worst part for me about recovery so I recommend not to eat heavy food until u go :/ lots of fiber
Didn't they give you or recommend a stool softener?

They gave a stool softener but all it did was give me really bad gas bubbles and after a caesarian it was extremely painful. I did finally go yesterday but that was only after refusing the stool softeners for a day or two.
I kept on taking the stool softener... Maybe that was the problem :/ it didn't help at all

question: I just had my baby through caesarian at 32 weeks. I had preeclampsia. For anyone who has had caesarian before, how long did it take before you could poop again?
title: gross question
